title: '311'
output: html_document
---

```{r 311}
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
w311 <- read_csv("311.csv") %>%
  subset(select = c(1,4))
colnames(w311) <- c("Date","Complaint")
w311$Yr_Month <- format(as.Date(w311$Date, "%m/%d/%Y"), "%Y-%m")
a <- subset(w311, select = c(3,2)) %>%
  group_by(Yr_Month) %>% tally()
w311 <- subset(w311, select = c(3,2)) %>%
  group_by(Yr_Month, Complaint) %>% tally() %>%
  dcast(Yr_Month~Complaint) %>%
  subset(select=c(-1))
w311 <- w311[, colSums(is.na(w311)) == 0]


```
